properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND USER_TYPE = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PWD, USER_NICK, USER_PHONE ) VALUES(SEQ_USERNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = ?, USER_PWD = ?, USER_NICK = ?, USER_PHONE = ?, USER_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_TYPE = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_TYPE = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
